name: OVERTURN: Final Operation
summary:
After the down of Beholder, MAGI is left alone and since the final fight, she lost all her abilities and is unable to fight anymore. 
Enemies are still coming and they shows no sign of stopping... 
It’s terrifying to see that there are still a huge number of enemies even many of them have been defeated before. The enemies surround MAGI and come to get her. 
 
Thought this is the end, MAGI is giving up slowly, but all of a sudden unknown Androids come and fight the enemies. 
Startled, MAGI looks at them. She has no idea of who they are and where they come from. But one thing that she knows, the androids are sent to protect and rescue her. 
 
MAGI uses the very last of her power and makes an attempt to escape with the help of the Androids.
